name: stalwart
content:
stalwart adjective
(LOYAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
loyal, especially for a long time; able to be trusted: She has been a stalwart supporter of the party for many years. Synonyms
committed
dedicated
devoted
faithful (LOYAL)
firm (CERTAIN)
loyal
staunch
steadfast approving
steady
true (SINCERE)
unfaltering
unshakeable mainlyUK
unswerving
unwaveringOpposite
disloyal

stalwart adjective
(STRONG)
formal (especially of a person) physically strong
